title: Burkina Faso Imports
description: Imports in Burkina Faso increased to 835.20 XOF Billion in the second quarter of 2022 from 744.50 XOF Billion in the first quarter of 2022. Imports in Burkina Faso averaged 130.46 XOF Billion from 1998 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 835.20 XOF Billion in the second quarter of 2022 and a record low of 14.20 XOF Billion in the first quarter of 1999. Burkina Faso main imports are: fuel (25 percent of total imports), foodstuffs and machinery. Burkina Faso main import partners are: Ivory Coast, United States, Japan, China, France, Belgium and Germany. This page provides - Burkina Faso Imports - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: INSD, Burkina Faso
